notes:
### v1.5.2
#### NEW FEATURES
- added option to hide meter/log on startup (settings > accessibility)
- added button to optimize database (use this if you delete encounters often)
#### BUG FIXES
- fix certain voldis adds counting as bosses

full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
